description:
Filled with rage against spirits known as tsukumogami, Kunato Hyoma is sent to live with Nagatsuki Botan to help him see a different side. Though both are part of a clan that return the spirits back to their world with divine powers, their experiences with the otherworldly vessels are vastly different. Kunato, robbed of a loved one, and Nagatsuki, saved by them. Can she get through to him?

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Youkai
tags.description: Prominently features supernatural creatures from Japanese folklore.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Martial Arts
tags.description: Centers around the use of traditional hand-to-hand combat.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Shapeshifting
tags.description: Features character(s) who changes one's appearance or form.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Family Life
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a family unit.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Amnesia
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) with memory loss.

tags.name: Battle Royale
tags.description: Centers around a fierce group competition, often violent and with only one winner.

tags.name: Karuta
tags.description: Centers around the game of karuta.

tags.name: Exorcism
tags.description: Involving religious methods of vanquishing youkai, demons, or other supernatural entities.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

title.native: もののがたり 第二章

_Note: Not to be confused with the EMT Squared animator [Satomi Watanabe](https://anilist.co/staff/360609/Satomi-Watanabe)._

__[Website](http://kandajohn.jp/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/johnkanda_pgr)__

__John Kanda__ is a Japanese composer, guitarist and member of five-piece rock band [PENGUIN RESEARCH](https://anilist.co/staff/120093/PENGUIN-RESEARCH)
__Hiromi Kikuta__ is a Japanese sound director, who works for the company Rakuonsha.

ARCANA PROJECT is a 6-member girl's vocal unit jointly produces by Lantis and DEARSTAGE featuring tarot cards. Mia_REGINA directs songs and dances. 
They made their debut on January 18, 2020, followed by their first organized live "ACE of CUPS" named after minor arcana.

The outfits are based on common design with personalized detail.

Two of them have just joined to DS Gaming Team to appear at eSports contests as well.

They released their pre-debut single ACE of WANDS on March 25, 2020. Due to the COVID-19 outbreak, all release events in March are canceled.

Currently they are performing occasionally at LINELIVE as a whole or part where membership is available instead of appearing at live house due to stayhome situation.

They have proudly announced that they will perform the opening theme for the Monster Girl Doctor Anime which will be airing on 2020 summer. They will release the song as their first single named カンパネラ響く空で(Campanella Hibiku Sora de)

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/miho_karasawa)__ | __[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/miho_karasawa/)__

Miho Karasawa is a Japanese singer who was previously signed to Horipro and is currently signed to Lantis.  Since 2014, she has performed under the stage name True (stylized as TRUE). 

She has performed theme songs for [Buddy Complex](https://anilist.co/anime/20533/), [Gargantia on the Verdurous Planet](https://anilist.co/anime/16524), [Maria the Virgin Witch](https://anilist.co/anime/20840) and [Sound! Euphonium](https://anilist.co/anime/20912/), among others. Karasawa made her debut in 2000 with the release of the song "Anytime, Anywhere".
He is a member of Writers Guild of Japan.
_Note: Not to be confused with the [background artist](https://anilist.co/staff/134785/)._
